Migrating Big Data Analytics into the Cloud

This document excerpt discusses the process of migrating big data analytics into the cloud, covering topics such as business applications, skills development, and community connection. It is a presentation by Mike Barlow, presented by O'Reilly and Cloudera, and published in 2014.
